parameters.strikes: number of strikes (number of contract strikes in U.S. manufacturing beginning each month)
parameters.output: level of economic activity (measured as cyclical departure of aggregate production from its trend level)

title: Number of Strikes in Us Manufacturing
description:
Description
monthly observations from 1968(1) to 1976 (12)
number of observations :  108
observation :  country
country :  United States
reference: Kennan, J. (1985) “The Duration of Contract strikes in U.S. Manufacturing”, Journal of Econometrics, 28, 5-28.
